newGroupRequested.title: New Group Requested...
newGroupRequested.message: We will notify you via text if the new group is accepted (1-2 days)

tacksScreen.title: My Tacks
tacksScreen.description: Here are your ongoing Tacks (the ones you have created yourself or completing for others)

tackerTacks.description: Looks like you haven't created any currently ongoing Tacks. Go to the Create Tack page to create your next Tack.

runnerTacks.description: Looks like you aren't currently completing any Tacks. Go to the Home Feed to find and accept your next Tack.

groupsScreen.title: Groups
groupsScreen.description: Create and complete tasks between a select group of people (invite-only or public groups)

createGroupScreen.title: Create Group
createGroupScreen.description: Enter in the following details to create a group

thirdParty.secDescription: This is an invite-only beta version of our app. Our official marketplace releases later this Fall. For more details, check out tackmarketplace.com
thirdParty.description: We temporarily use Venmo to process payments from both parties. Please connect to your Venmo account in order to recieve payments for completing Tacks or creating Tacks for others to complete.

createTack.title: Create Tack
createTack.description: Select one of the following templates or create a Tack from scratch

inviteMembersScreen.title: Invite Link
inviteMembersScreen.description: Copy or share this link to invite members to group
